briefTitle: BRCA1/2 and Effect of Mifepristone on the Breast
officialTitle: The Effect of a Progesterone Receptor Modulator on Breast Tissue in Women With BRCA-1 and -2 Mutations - a Placebo Controlled RCT.
conditions: Women With Mutations in the Breast Cancer Susceptibility Genes BRCA1,2
primaryOutcomeMeasure: epithelial cell proliferation in breast tissue
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* Pre-menopausal women, \>/= 18 years of age
* with good general health and
* regular menstrual cycles (25-35 days) who are willing and
* able to participate after giving informed consent.
* women having BRCA1/2 mutation and have decided to undergo risk reducing mastectomy

Exclusion criteria includes:

* Any hormonal treatment used within 2 months prior to study start and
* Any contraindication to mifepristone
